1.1.name: wordpress/third-party-host-fix
1.1.description: Fixes Wordpress' inability to find the install directory when it's not in the root folder. This includes hosting services such as 5Gigs and Bytehost. This is a plugin workaround of the "Cannot find Content directory (WP-Content)" or "Unable to locate WordPress Root directory. Installation Failed" errors to get the following built in features working : Plugin Installation, Theme Installation and Wordpress AutoUpdate.
